function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Unamplified synthetic dna used to set up pcr conditions may introduce contamination during subsequent experiments.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modelling assumption based on incomplete understanding of disease transmission","category":"Public health
